skills.Name: Hydro Strike
skills.Description: Uses the power of storm to inflict damage with 57 power added to M. Atk. and generates strong squall to make the target faint for 5 seconds.

skills.Name: Windy Healing Potion
skills.Description: Converts Windy Healing Potion. Elementary Alchemy.

skills.Name: Squall
skills.Description: For 10 minutes, received P./M. Critical Damage - 15%. Has a chance of striking target with lightning.

skills.Name: Air Rush
skills.Description: Knocks down target and attacks with 57 Power added to M. Atk. 10% more damage if target is debuffed. If target has Storm Sign, eliminates it and inflicts additional damage. Requires a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Eye of the Storm
skills.Description: For 30 seconds, M. Critical Rate + 100, P./M. Def. + 30%.

skills.Name: Alchemy Cube
skills.Description: Can use the Alchemy Cube. Elementary Combination Alchemy.

skills.Name: Eminent Quick Recovery
skills.Description: Max. MP + 33, MP Recovery Bonus + 1, and M. Skill Cooldown - 10%.

skills.Name: Eminent Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with a blunt weapon, M. Atk. + 17% and + 228, Casting Spd. + 10%, and brands target with Storm Sign when using Hydro Attack.

skills.Name: Eminent Robe Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with a robe, P. Def. + 12, Magic Damage Resistance + 5%. Shields and Sigils are not worn, as you move with the wind.

skills.Name: Eminent Ability
skills.Description: INT +2.

skills.Name: Hydro Attack
skills.Description: Attacks target with s1 Power added to M. Atk., and brands target with Storm Sign. 10% more damage if target is debuffed. Requires a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Hydro Flare
